about.title: About NARA Library
about.description: The NARA Library is a specialized resource center focusing on marine science, aquatic research, and fisheries management. Our collection includes scientific publications, research reports, theses, and digital resources from around the world.

carousel.title: Featured
carousel.description: Discover our curated collection of marine science research, publications, and resources
carousel.accessInfo: Access thousands of research papers, publications, and marine science resources
